messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Life Learning Magazine and David Albert
messages.msgSnippet: ... From: starsuncloud@cs.com To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, April 23, 2003 1:02 PM Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Life Learning
messages.messageBody:
----- Original Message -----
From: starsuncloud@...
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, April 23, 2003 1:02 PM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Life Learning Magazine and David Albert



And we like what you write David!!! :)

Especially your new book Homeschooling: A Voyage Of Self-Discovery with that amazing art work. Okay so I'm a proud Mom.

Maureen

Yahoo! Groups Sponsor
ADVERTISEMENT

messages.subject: Life Learning Magazine and David Albert
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/23/03 6:38:02 AM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/23/03 6:38:02 AM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< I write for both Home Ed. Magazine and for Life Learning and I like
them both. >>

And we like what you write David!!! :)

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
